display_long_description:
# *THE #1 VR SOCIAL COLLECTIBLE CARD GAME IS FREE TO PLAY!*
Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!
[media]
# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
[media]
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
[media]
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
[media]
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
[media]

# *THE #1 VR SOCIAL COLLECTIBLE CARD GAME IS FREE TO PLAY!*
Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!

# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822897_2207211333017644_8618162970932046056_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=5ehKMi5aouUQ7kNvwE9FwOy&_nc_oc=Adn__KGiJJKugFQwIPZKqVydoeC0j2RNNYJ0Up1YPNb_agg4ZNUaaImxK1BvlZyReBQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=_gF93uh24jcH0xnikdINwQ&oh=00_Afp0UvfLt0l0m_iJqAEJmnU-nnEGOHaa5uJ9RzI0l3HcUg&oe=697858E1)
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499292712_2011949136257433_2240288442270214956_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fx_dLJQjhoIQ7kNvwHhxtBl&_nc_oc=AdkBDIHMGBQO2vi9BHILPo00NCeyZY-JcaasRND2dpnYs7XNIoLIbyft0JQNlyS7uEY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=_gF93uh24jcH0xnikdINwQ&oh=00_Afqjjnwhuw8-CI1TdnFHqjQoBcsN60aoI3fbkzzOvh4W6A&oe=69784F89)
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_1952193972016857_1573896307480103320_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=e_aWzpviW3UQ7kNvwFuWk00&_nc_oc=AdnKWIprTEcW7QYVHmNTZIkHVqY87_cnjn1zEAxPPouRJEFsQmsF5SDSLXdUNyY52UE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=_gF93uh24jcH0xnikdINwQ&oh=00_Afql06djBqyV-hzObWlsUYgI_pGUfrzyVmYlYVGyVeRwWw&oe=69785812)
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822813_1735619753788707_6789934812689609528_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=JC08nGi6zH8Q7kNvwFZEEwp&_nc_oc=Adlk2wLLxQWFRROzaXgh5eQYBG-hZ_zfdEjDJkfFwxwyXdAUiXftzJIjQ9an-23QrEk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=_gF93uh24jcH0xnikdINwQ&oh=00_Afrch9ZedAJC-oGGeESrjFtF-i5PlR8ghSd3mkv4obbKCw&oe=69784558)
